sentence: Cawthorn's two main opponents are state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R), considered the so-called establishment pick, and Michele Woodhouse, a former GOP district chair.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Mounting scandals fuel uncertainty over Cawthorn's reelection

sentence: Cawthorn's two main opponents are state Sen. Chuck Edwards (R), considered the so-called establishment pick, and Michele Woodhouse, a former GOP district chair.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Mounting scandals fuel uncertainty over Cawthorn's reelection

sentence: Tillis and many of North Carolina's top Republicans, including the state's House speaker and Senate leader, are backing a challenger, state Sen. Chuck Edwards, in next Tuesday's primary.
title: Inside the Republican campaign to take down Madison Cawthorn
